subject: re:Don't waste your time. Cheap pills are here.
body:
Dear valued member.
MyCanadianPharmacy provides a wide range of pharmaceutical products. You will be surprised by the selection of products available. 
Receive world class pharmaceutical products and pay less than you could pay for American drugs of the same quality.
For more information click herehttp://hotheard.hk
High quality of our products is the subject of our primary concern.No fraud and no scamming is possible.
Sincerely yours,Ralph Kiser
